name: Kings And Goblins
description:
Kings and Goblins is a old-school difficult 2D platformer.

The Goblin Lord has led a horde of goblins to conquer the King's castle.
You will play as the King who has lost everything, fight through 3 levels to reach the Goblin Lord and finally get revenge. Free the castle, the Throne awaits you.

Unlock 2 additional game modes as soon as you beat the game:

Hardcore mode
  • No level selection, you have to beat the game all at once.
  • All Hearts pickups disappear.
  • You start the game with only 1 Heart.

Speedrun mode
  • No level selection, you have to beat the game all at once.
  • A stopwatch will appear counting your game time (How fast can you beat the game??)
  • Your time will be saved and shown on the ranking page if you hit the top 5.

Explore all levels to collect all diamonds.

Avoid the goblins' traps.

Unlock all achievements to decor the Main Menu screen.

Find all secrets.




Asset pack "Kings and Pigs" from Pixel Frog
